data.eml:eml: Taxonomic review of the genus Leucopholis Dejean, 1833 (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae: Leucopholini) in the Philippines

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Calcetas, Orlando A., Adorada, Jessamyn R. (2017): Taxonomic review of the genus Leucopholis Dejean, 1833 (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae: Leucopholini) in the Philippines. Zootaxa 4232 (1): 85-103, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4232.1.6
